title: r/Antiwork "I DON'T CARE THAT YOUR DAD DIED, GET TO WORK!"
description: r/Antiwork We've all had day where getting out of bed and dragging yourself to work feels like pure torture. If you're feel frustrated about your job, these posts will give you a bit of hope. We've got stories of workers standing up against their corporate overlords and oppressive work policies. Have you ever wanted to tell your boss to shove it? These people did exactly that!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
